text: Kɨ osirizir akar kam, an mɨngarim kamakɨn: Gumazir Kraisɨn adarazir aven iti tam arazir kurabagh amua, gumazamizir uari bakɨava akuir arazim gami, o gumazir igharazibar biziba bagha navim dɨkafi, o marvir guabar ziaba fe, o akar kuraba uari gasir arazim gami, o dɨpar onganiba api, o gumazir igharazibar biziba okei, ia gumazir kam ko ikian markɨ. Puvatɨ. Ia uaghan gumazir kamaghɨn amim ko daghebar aman kogham.
